comment.author: 78707360@N00
comment._content: I just can't get over how the distribution of these pics on flickr has led many norwegians from the corresponding areas to comment, which again has consequently led to LOC being able to update info on the pictures. For me, it's inspiring to see how my country looked like a hundred years ago. Absolutely amazing :)

comment._content: Wonderful! It's fantastic that all these old photos have been uploaded here.
